Question: Under President ****'s leadership, federal funding for HIV/AIDS research, prevention and treatment more than doubled.
Hints: Born and raised in Arkansas, this person became both a student leader and a skilled musician.
At the end of his presidency, this person moved to New York and helped his wife win election to the U.S Senate there.
The ____ Presidential Center was opened in Little Rock, Arkansas in his honor on December 5, 2001.
